alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin; Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 1:29PM CDT until June 17 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN COLBERT...NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN AND SOUTHWESTERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 128 PM CDT, emergency management officials reported golfball sized hail along Highway 157 and County Line Road associated with a severe thunderstorm located 10 miles east of Littleville, or 12 miles west of Moulton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Moulton, Littleville, Leighton, Newburg, Hatton, Mt Hope, La Grange, Tharptown, Ne Smith and Whiteoak. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
